sentences.sentence: "You see," he continued apologetically, "it would make me seem so old to be their real father."
sentences.translation: “你看，”他继续抱歉地说，“做他们的亲生父亲，会让我显得那么老。”

sentences.sentence: 'I'm sorry I'm late,' he murmured apologetically.
sentences.translation: “对不起，我迟到了。”他小声道歉说。

sentences.sentence: "It's of no great literary merit," he said, almost apologetically.
sentences.translation: “它不具有重要的文学价值，”他几乎抱歉地说道。
